Sergio Marchionne , 58, caused a stir in Italy after saying February 4 the Turin-based carmaker and Chrysler Group LLC may end up looking like one entity, possibly based in the US. He later backtracked, saying no decision has been made and the issue would be dealt with no sooner than 2014. Fiat owns a 25 per cent stake in Auburn Hills, Michigan-based

Allen Iverson had 32 points and 12 assists Wednesday night, and the Nuggets used a late run to beat the Grizzlies 106-102. This was a big win for us at somebody else's home, Allen Iverson said.`` Down seven points with 3 minutes to go. It was a gut check for us. I Roy think a game like this is going to help us down the road.'' Elias Says Allen Iverson

Spy''/> Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer has said that the Xbox 360 is not a games console. He told USA Today that its multimedia capabilities and Kinect support makes it an entertainment device. Xbox isn't a gaming console. Xbox is a family entertainment centre. It's a place to socialise, he said.`` It's a place to watch TV. We have Hulu coming. It's the only system where you are the controller. Your voice, your gestures, your body.''

During a recent interview, Simon Cowell has revealed that he will be making an announcement in regard to the show in two weeks. As Digital Spy reports, Simon Cowell said of the new show: We are in the process of going through all the shows. I think there are going to be a few surprises. I genuinely do. I don't think there's one set way of doing it.... I am in conversations with ITV and Fox. Simon Cowell went on to reveal:`` We are going to make an announcement soon. We have to make sure all the shows will be back bigger, better, stronger, different. No-one has been contracted yet

n't be voting for him for president in the next election, she expects to be doing so someday.`` I'll vote for him for president when he runs,'' Shirley Houston said. I'd really like to see him for president. I know he'll make a good governor. Pundits say you can't leave Congress and run for president. I'm not sure that's true. It's all where God wants you to serve. Shirley Houston said that because she knows Mike Pence is a godly man, she is sure he prayed and sought the leadership of the Lord in making his decision not to run for president in 2012.

Microsoft Dynamics CRM redefines productivity by offering an industry-leading product that is fully embracing the cloud. The things that make Microsoft Dynamics CRM an industry leader include giving sales professionals a familiar user experience, enabling greater collaboration, streamlining of processes and access to real-time data so they can improve their customers' experiences and effectively compete in the market. Asked about prospects for new gun restrictions, Representative Mike Pence , Republican of Indiana, asserted,`` I maintain that firearms in the hands of law-abiding citizens makes communities safer, not less safe.

Former Republican state Rep. Jackie Walorski , a tea party favorite who narrowly lost her race last year against Democratic Rep. Joe Donnelly in northern Indiana, said she was excited by the prospect of Mike Pence running for governor. I think he's the clear frontrunner and I think the race is his if he chooses to accept it, Jackie Walorski said.`` I think he'd clear the field.''
